question.ask: Questions 1~2  Your parents have just seen a newly-released film. Ask them two questions about the film.

std.value: Who is the leading actor of the film? What is the film about?
std.ai: Who is the leading actor of the film? What is the film about?

std.value: How long does the film last? Did you enjoy the film?
std.ai: How long does the film last? Did you enjoy the film?

std.value: Who is the director of this film? What do you think of the film?
std.ai: Who is the director of this film? What do you think of the film?

std.value: What is the plot of the film? Is the film inspiring?
std.ai: What is the plot of the film? Is the film inspiring?

std.value: Who does the film star? What do you think of his or her acting?
std.ai: Who does the film star? What do you think of his or her acting?

std.value: What’s the name of the film? Is it interesting?
std.ai: What’s the name of the film? Is it interesting?

std.value: What kind of film did you watch? Would recommend it to others?
std.ai: What kind of film did you watch? Would recommend it to others?

std.value: What is the film mainly about? Is it a comedy or an action film?
std.ai: What is the film mainly about? Is it a comedy or an action film?

std.value: What is the movie mainly about? Is it a comedy or an action movie?
std.ai: What is the movie mainly about? Is it a comedy or an action movie?

std.value: Who is the leading actor of the movie? What is the movie about?
std.ai: Who is the leading actor of the movie? What is the movie about?

std.value: How long does the movie last? Did you enjoy the movie?
std.ai: How long does the movie last? Did you enjoy the movie?

std.value: Who is the director of this movie? What do you think of the movie?
std.ai: Who is the director of this movie? What do you think of the movie?

std.value: What is the plot of the movie? Is the movie inspiring?
std.ai: What is the plot of the movie? Is the movie inspiring?

std.value: Who does the movie star? What do you think of his or her acting?
std.ai: Who does the movie star? What do you think of his or her acting?

std.value: What’s the name of the movie? Is it interesting?
std.ai: What’s the name of the movie? Is it interesting?

std.value: What kind of movie did you watch? Would recommend it to others?
std.ai: What kind of movie did you watch? Would recommend it to others?

question.keywords: Who is leading actor of film|What movie about|How long does last|Did enjoy film|Who is director of movie|What do think of film|What is plot of film|Is film inspiring|Who does film star|What do think of acting|What name of film|Is it interesting|What kind did watch|Would recommend to others|What film about|Is it comedy action

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your nephew has got some red packets during the Spring Festival. Ask him two questions about red packets?

std.value: Who gave you the red packets? Do you know the history of the red packet?
std.ai: Who gave you the red packets? Do you know the history of the red packet?

std.value: How many red packets did you get? How would you spend the money?
std.ai: How many red packets did you get? How would you spend the money?

std.value: What are you going to do with the money? Do you enjoy receiving red packets?
std.ai: What are you going to do with the money? Do you enjoy receiving red packets?

std.value: Are you happy about receiving red packets? Who will keep them for you?
std.ai: Are you happy about receiving red packets? Who will keep them for you?

std.value: How are you going to deal with the money? Have you ever donated some of the money?
std.ai: How are you going to deal with the money? Have you ever donated some of the money?

question.keywords: Who gave red packets|Do know history of red packet|How many red packets did get|How would you spend money|What are going do with money|Do enjoy receiving red packets|Are happy about receiving red packets|Who will keep them|How are you going to deal with money|Have donated some money
